distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for tomcat fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2024-38286: OutOfMemory exception triggered through abuse of the TLS handshake process. (bsc#1230986)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use
